structure.unit: STATE AND REGIONAL MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS

law.text: The secretary for health and family services may transfer any employee between the institutions operated by the cabinet, or to the headquarters of the cabinet. Necessary moving expenses involved in such transfers shall be paid by the cabinet.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 306, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 251, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(1), (8) and (21). -- Amended 1960Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 3, effective June 16, 1960. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 50, sec. 8.
